entry.title: $1933 // Room for Rent in Spacious 3BR on Beautiful Block of Brownstones
entry.content:
One bedroom (with private bathroom) for rent in a 3BR/2BA apartment, starting as soon as desired.

• Great location in Lincoln Square area (W 70's), less than a block from Central Park
• Large, high-ceiling common area with big windows and full-size appliances
• Exposed brick and hardwood floors
• Incredibly quiet location, but a 3 min. walk from 72nd St. 1-2-3 stop
• (Email me for exact address)

The remaining roommates are young professionals (late 20's) who honestly enjoy having roommates... provided they're the right roommates! Both are hard-working, neat, and respectful of the common areas. None of us knew each other when we moved in, but we've settled on a good mix of both some shared things (we'll share meals from time to time) and privacy.

The outgoing roommate is leaving the city for a new job but is disappointed to be leaving this apartment. We're looking for an easy-going, non-smoking, respectful young professional - in your response, please tell us a little about yourself.

Cheers!
